mapper.insert:
select freeboard_comment_sequence.nextval from dual
insert into freeBoard_comment( freeboard_comment_no, write_date, freeboard_comment, hits, id, board_no, ref, restep, relevel ) values(#{commentNo},sysdate,#{comment},0,#{id},#{boardNo},#{boardNo},0,0)
mapper.select: select freeboard_comment_no,write_date, freeboard_comment, hits, id, board_no from( select freeboard_comment_no,write_date, freeboard_comment, hits, id, board_no, ceil(rownum/3) as page from( select freeboard_comment_no,to_char(write_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') as write_date, freeboard_comment, hits, id, board_no from freeBoard_comment where board_no=#{boardNo} order by freeboard_comment_no desc))where page=#{pageNo}
select count(*) from freeBoard_comment where board_no=#{boardNo}
